title: Laravel Validation Vocabulary
description: Custom JSON Schema vocabulary implementing Laravel's validation rules

acceptedIf.description: Field must be accepted if another field equals a value

activeUrl.description: Field must be a valid A or AAAA DNS record

after.description: Date must be after another date field or value

afterOrEqual.description: Date must be after or equal to another date field or value

alpha.description: Field must contain only alphabetic characters

alphaDash.description: Field may contain alpha-numeric characters, dashes, and underscores

alphaNumeric.description: Field must contain only alpha-numeric characters

anyOf.description: At least one of the specified rules must pass

array.description: Field must be an array, optionally with specified allowed keys

ascii.description: Field must contain only 7-bit ASCII characters

bail.description: Stop validation on first failure for this field

before.description: Date must be before another date field or value

beforeOrEqual.description: Date must be before or equal to another date field or value

between.description: Field must be between min and max (inclusive)

boolean.description: Field must be boolean-castable: true, false, 1, 0, '1', '0'

confirmed.description: Field must have matching confirmation field

contains.description: Array must contain all specified values

currentPassword.description: Field must match authenticated user's current password

date.description: Field must be a valid date per strtotime()

dateEquals.description: Date must equal the given date

dateFormat.description: Date must match the given PHP date format(s)

decimal.description: Field must have specified decimal places

declinedIf.description: Field must be declined if another field equals a value

different.description: Field must differ from another field

digits.description: Field must be numeric with exact length

digitsBetween.description: Field must have length between min and max digits

distinct.description: Array must not have duplicate values

doesntContain.description: Array must not contain any specified values

doesntEndWith.description: Field must not end with any of the given values

doesntStartWith.description: Field must not start with any of the given values

email.description: Field must be a valid email address

endsWith.description: Field must end with one of the given values

enum.description: Field must be a valid enum case (PHP class name)

excludeWith.description: Exclude field if another field is present

excludeWithout.description: Exclude field if another field is not present

exists.description: Field must exist in database table

extensions.description: File must have one of the specified extensions

file.description: Field must be a successfully uploaded file

filled.description: Field must be present and not empty

greaterThan.description: Field must be greater than another field or value

greaterThanOrEqual.description: Field must be greater than or equal to another field or value

hexColor.description: Field must be a valid hex color (#RGB, #RRGGBB, #RRGGBBAA)

image.description: File must be an image (jpeg, png, bmp, gif, svg, webp)

in.description: Field must be included in the given list of values

inArray.description: Field must exist in another array field

inArrayKeys.description: Field must exist in keys of another array field

ipAddress.description: Field must be a valid IP address

json.description: Field must be a valid JSON string

lessThan.description: Field must be less than another field or value

lessThanOrEqual.description: Field must be less than or equal to another field or value

list.description: Array must have sequential numeric keys starting from 0

macAddress.description: Field must be a valid MAC address

max.description: Field must be at most this value (context-dependent: string length, numeric value, array count, file size in KB)

maxDigits.description: Field must have at most this many digits

mimes.description: File must match one of the MIME types (by extension)

mimetypes.description: File must match one of the MIME types (by content)

min.description: Field must be at least this value (context-dependent: string length, numeric value, array count, file size in KB)

minDigits.description: Field must have at least this many digits

missingIf.description: Field must be missing if condition met

missingUnless.description: Field must be missing unless condition met

missingWith.description: Field must be missing if any specified fields present

missingWithAll.description: Field must be missing if all specified fields present

multipleOf.description: Field must be a multiple of the given value

notIn.description: Field must not be included in the given list

notRegex.description: Field must not match the regular expression

present.description: Field must be present (can be empty)

presentIf.description: Field must be present if condition met

presentUnless.description: Field must be present unless condition met

presentWith.description: Field must be present if any specified fields present

presentWithAll.description: Field must be present if all specified fields present

prohibitedIfAccepted.description: Field prohibited if another field is accepted

prohibitedIfDeclined.description: Field prohibited if another field is declined

prohibits.description: If field present, specified fields must not be

regex.description: Field must match the regular expression

required.description: Field must be present and not empty

requiredArrayKeys.description: Array must contain all specified keys

requiredIf.description: Field required if another field has specific value

requiredIfAccepted.description: Field required if another field is accepted

requiredIfDeclined.description: Field required if another field is declined

requiredUnless.description: Field required unless another field has specific value

requiredWith.description: Field required if any other specified fields are present

requiredWithAll.description: Field required if all other specified fields are present

requiredWithout.description: Field required if any other specified fields are not present

requiredWithoutAll.description: Field required if all other specified fields are not present

size.description: Field must have exact size (context-dependent: string length, numeric value, array count, file size in KB)

sometimes.description: Only validate if field is present

startsWith.description: Field must start with one of the given values

timezone.description: Field must be a valid timezone identifier

ulid.description: Field must be a valid ULID

unique.description: Field must be unique in database table

url.description: Field must be a valid URL

uuid.description: Field must be a valid UUID
